column2: Avanos Medical, Inc. is a medical technology company, which focuses on delivering clinically medical device solutions to improve patients' quality of life. The company is headquartered in Alpharetta, Georgia and currently employs 4,700 full-time employees. The firm provides a portfolio of product offerings focused on surgical and interventional pain management, respiratory and digestive health. Its products include post-operative pain management solutions, minimally invasive interventional or chronic pain therapies, closed airway suction systems and enteral feeding tubes. The companyâ€™s products are sold under the ON-Q, COOLIEF, MICROCUFF, MIC-KEY, QUIKBLOC, HOMEPUMP, CORTRAK and other brand names.
